content.c_answer2: The Tina Turner musical can be found at the Aldwych Theatre, which is on the corner of the A4 and Drury Lane. The nearest tube stations are Temple and Covent Garden. Overground train services are available from Charing Cross station.
content.name: Where is Tina Turner the musical playing in London?
content.question: Where is Tina Turner the musical playing in London?
